rules_text:
Flying, vigilance
[i]Deliverer[/i] – Whenever Cherche, Griffin Captain attacks, untap each creature you control with flying, after this phase there is an additional combat phase. This ability triggers only once each turn.
[i]Aerial Mastery[/i] – Other creatures you control with flying get +2/+2.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {3}{R}{W}{W}
